Name: Glory of war
About the game: Glory of War is a nostalgic strategic turn-based RPG that combines the SLG mechanics. No download needed. In this fantasy world, you will take a dangerous journey to recover your memory and protect the world. Collect powerful weapons, equipment and treasures from the demons to prepare for the last battle between light and darkness. Learn more in Glory of War!
